sentences.sContent: Sarah rejected her brother’s offer of help.
sentences.sCn: 萨拉拒绝了她弟弟的帮助。

sentences.sContent: Dexter flatly rejected (= completely rejected ) calls for his resignation.
sentences.sCn: 德克斯特断然拒绝让他辞职的要求。

sentences.sContent: His proposal was rejected outright (= completely rejected ) .
sentences.sCn: 他的建议被彻底否决了。

sentences.sContent: ...will often reject entire crops of perfectly edible fruit and vegetables at the farm because they do not meet exacting marketing standards for their physical characteristics...
...Why does the speaker say we should reject to stereotypes...
...We should reject to stereotypes because they force all people in a group into the same simple pattern...

remMethod.val: re(反) ＋ ject(扔) → 被扔回来 → 拒绝； 退回

words.tran: 抛弃；拒绝；被抛弃的东西；盖帽

trans.tranCn: 拒绝； 拒纳， 退回， 摈弃
trans.tranOther: to refuse to accept, believe in, or agree with something

trans.tranCn: 被拒货品， 不合格产品
trans.tranOther: a product that has been rejected because there is something wrong with it
